name: Lake Village
description:
HELP YOUR FRIEND GET HER ENIGMATIC BOOK BACK!

Blake serves the village as a guard, and now he's received a task to help out his friend Lily, a librarian who got one of her most important books stolen by one of her friends.
Embark on a journey to get your friend's stolen book back, going through the village's most outlandish locations to get the book back!

Please don't forget to review our game:

We need game reviews for our assignment!

https://forms.gle/k337HacaifQZUsJD7

What to expect from this game:
  • Game Boy aesthetic
  • A narrative-driven game, set in a fantasy world
  • Fun dialogue
  • Linear experience
  • Satisfying puzzles
Controls

To move, use the arrow keys, and to interact use the Z key

Credits

Pedro Monteiro

Nelson Antunes

Beatriz Fernandes

Made with GB Studio
